巧.definition: opportunely; coincidentally; as it happens; skillful; timely

巧人.definition: Homo habilis, extinct species of upright East African hominid (Tw)

巧婦.definition: clever wife; ingenious housewife; Eurasian wren (Troglodytes troglodytes)

巧婦難為無米之炊.pinyin: qiǎo fù nán wèi wú mǐ zhī chuī
巧婦難為無米之炊.definition: The cleverest housewife cannot cook without rice (idiom); You won't get anywhere without equipment.

巧家.definition: Qiaojia county in Zhaotong 昭通[Zhao1 tong1], Yunnan

巧家縣.definition: Qiaojia county in Zhaotong 昭通[Zhao1 tong1], Yunnan

巧幹.definition: to work resourcefully; to apply intelligence

巧手.definition: skillful hands; dexterous; a dab hand

巧立名目.definition: to fabricate excuses (idiom); to concoct various items (e.g. to pad an expense account)

巧舌如簧.definition: lit. to have a tongue like the reed of a wind instrument (idiom); fig. to have a glib tongue

巧言令色.definition: to be glib in one's speech and wear an ingratiating expression (idiom)

巧詐不如拙誠.pinyin: qiǎo zhà bù rú zhuō chéng
巧詐不如拙誠.definition: the unvarnished truth is better than a cunning ruse (idiom); honesty is the best policy

巧辯.definition: to argue skillfully or plausibly; rhetoric
